DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to evaluate the technical performance of magnetic-resonance guided radiotherapy (MRgRT) facility at the Princess Margaret Cancer Centre and the impact on the workflow of the clinical team in this facility.
DOC.brief_title: Receiving Radiation Therapy in the MRgRT Research Facility
DOC.criteria: Ability to provide informed consent Planned to receive clinical intervention (imaging or treatment) in the MRgRT facility At least 18 years of age
